message: Auucchh! i've tried this keyword "django cookbook", and yes, great documentation. Great community? Haven't found one, could you light me? Local active community maybe?
most of Django hackers are already in https://convore.com/django-community/
i dont know if django-community is local community :D, i think is an international community
anyway hope we could meet at 25th June Coffee Land (kopdar) LOL
there is http://django.or.id, but the community is still small. see you then.
hmm.. kalo buka django.or.id langsung terbuka tutorial blog nya, menurut gw sih ada frontpage dulu yg isinya lebih ke 'what is django' dan 'why i should try django'
@xigit :) kalo begitu ini harus dibongkar lagi mingus nya buat support kayak gitu.
Mingusnya kita pindahin bagian blog aja.
@xigit @gchandrasa paling ntar kita pasangin CMS buat beberapa static page yang menjelaskan tentang django,
